product_overview: Learnify is a modern, mobile-first e-learning platform providing mentor-led programs with real-world skill development and an intuitive, accessible digital experience across all devices.
core_goals: Deliver mentor-led, structured programs with measurable outcomes.
Build a mobile-first interface that scales elegantly to desktop and other devices.
Ensure fully responsive, accessible, and bug-free UI/UX across browsers and screen sizes.
Handle edge cases like poor internet connectivity and slow devices gracefully.
Maintain strong security, privacy and accessibility standards (WCAG 2.1 compliance).
key_features: Hero Section with engaging headline and responsive CTA to Explore Programs.
Program Explorer with dynamic grid/list views, lazy loading, expandable modals or routed detail pages, and SEO optimization.
Mentor Showcase with bio cards including avatars, roles, badges and responsive autocolllapsing grid.
Why Choose Us section with animated cards using Framer Motion and enhanced accessibility features.
Testimonials carousel supporting swipe and arrow navigation, authenticated review submissions, profanity filtering, and duplicate prevention.
Contact and Inquiry Forms with multi-field validations, spam protection (reCAPTCHA or honeypot), and friendly error handling.
User Authentication with OAuth (Google) and Email/Password (JWT based) and a user dashboard including enrolled courses, notes, and certificates.
Responsive Header & Navigation with hamburger menu for mobile, responsive footer with social links and newsletter forms.
Reusable UI components and custom React hooks for mobile detection and toast notifications.
Performance optimizations like lazy loading, image fallback handling, and global error boundary recovery.
user_flow_summary: Landing on the home page, users see the Hero Section with CTA leading to program browsing.
Users navigate to Program Explorer to browse learning modules with dynamic filtering and view details.
Users can view mentor bios on the Mentor Showcase and learn about platform advantages in the Why Choose Us section.
Authenticated users submit testimonials and access their dashboard for enrolled courses and certificates.
Users can contact support or subscribe to newsletters via responsive forms with validation and spam protection.
Authentication flow supporting OAuth sign-in and fallback email/password login with proper token refresh handling.
validation_criteria: UI renders correctly and responsively across all supported devices and browsers.
Edge cases like slow network, empty states, broken images are handled gracefully with placeholders and loaders.
Forms validate entries properly with visual feedback and prevent spam submissions effectively.
Security features such as HTTPS-only cookies, bcrypt hashing, and GDPR compliant data handling are in place.
Accessibility standards are met including ARIA labels, keyboard navigations, and readable content structure.
Performance is optimized with lazy loading, minimal layout shifts, and appropriate error boundaries.
User authentication tokens refresh automatically and sessions maintain securely without crashes or glitches.
